body: Hi Ibby, Maybe you can find some reference from **Axel Jacob's "Radiance Cookbook":** [http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/documentation/docs/radiance...](http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/documentation/docs/radiance_cookbook.pdf) - Ji [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0w*H4sG5kMp9bWYuZckIajtQpYUcAHgiW4sjgLXT0*0Vk9KHHpYgzFZTjI1mVGbK7*hXOUgzgDsjW3PxU*udZvQG7KX2Ldmx/Image15.png)
